text: The 2013 AFC U-22 Championship is a football tournament for players under the age of 22. It was held in 11 - 26 January IN 2014. All the Asian under-22 football teams can compete. == Teams == * Iraq (Group A winners) * United Arab Emirates (Group A runners-up) * Saudi Arabia (Group B winners) * Syria (Group B runners-up) * Iran (Group C winners) * Kuwait (Group C runners-up) * Jordan (Group D winners) * Uzbekistan (Group D runners-up) * North Korea (Group F winners) * China PR (Group F runners-up) * South Korea (Group G winners) * Myanmar (Group G runners-up) ==Results== RSSSF ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 8 2 +6 7 align=left 3 2 1 0 6 1 +5 7 align=left 3 1 0 2 4 3 +1 3 align=left 3 0 0 3 1 13 -12 0 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 3 1 +2 7 align=left 3 1 2 0 2 1 +1 5 align=left 3 1 1 1 3 2 +1 4 align=left 3 0 0 3 1 5 -4 0 ====Group C==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 0 1 2 4 -2 6 align=left 3 1 2 0 7 3 +4 5 align=left 3 1 1 1 6 5 +1 4 align=left 3 0 1 2 1 4 -3 1 ====Group D==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 6 2 +4 9 align=left 3 2 0 1 4 4 0 6 align=left 3 1 0 2 3 4 -1 3 align=left 3 0 0 3 2 5 -3 0 ===Knockout stage=== ==References== Category:AFC U-23 Asian Cup Category:2013 in Asian football Category:Sport in Oman Category:January 2014 events
title: 2013 AFC U-22 Championship
